body: Lady Liberty Welcomes Your Class! Imagine being in busy New York Harbor on Liberty Island and seeing the torch, the crown, the tablet—the entire statue in person! Throughout the "For Teachers" section of this website, you can find lesson plans to use in your classroom or on Liberty Island, discover our Ranger in Your Classroom program, and learn about planning a field trip to visit this colossal statue with your class.  Teachers, if you're planning to visit with your class, consider our self-guided activity sheets.                  Celebrate a Symbol Visiting or learning about the Statue of Liberty? Look through this guide for lesson plans, self-guided tour ideas, and other insightful information.
